text: Senator Rubio met with Venezuelan deputies on his arrival to @SummitAmericas to discuss concrete steps to restore democracy and strengthen the role of the democratically elected @AsambleaVE #Venezuela

El Senador Rubio se reunió con los diputados venezolanos a su llegada a la @CumbreAmericas para discutir pasos concretos para restaurar la democracia y fortalecer el rol de la @AsambleaVE quienes fueron electos democráticamente http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dat9qcvXkAAZCU-.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dat9qcyW0AAz7HZ.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dat9qcyWsAAt2XI.jpg
But tonight, our support and prayers are with the brave Americans in uniform, as well as our trusted allies in France and the U.K., who carried out these military strikes.

In the days ahead, I look forward to the President making the case to Congress and the American people that his proposed course of action in Syria is in the national security interests of this country.

We should withdraw from President Obama's disastrous Iran deal that is enriching the Iran government with billions of dollars, and those ill-gotten gains are in turn being funneled to Syria to prop up the Bashar regime.

It is now absolutely crucial that any further military action we take in Syria remains focused on protecting the vital national security interests of our country. In addition to any military action that we may choose to take, we must also take action against Assad’s financiers.
Critically, that includes preventing those chemical weapons from falling into the hands of the radical Islamic terrorist elements in Syria.

Tonight, the United States responded to the atrocities of Bashar al-Assad. As the President said, it is in our national interest to deter the use of chemical weapons. —> https://www.cruz.senate.gov/?p=press_release&id=3732
RT @SenBooker .@CoryBooker Statement on Military Strikes in Syria: https://www.booker.senate.gov/?p=press_release&id=774

RT @ADL_National Thank you @SenBooker for raising some of the serious questions we expressed to the Senate about #Pompeo’s nomination. What is Faith if not tested; Hope unless it unceasingly confronts despair? 

Darkness may seem ascendant;
Meanness unfettered by shame
And hate may grow arrogant in its assaults.

But this is the very time that our light, kindness, and love must be brave, daring, and relentless.

Honored to meet today with Venezuelan opposition leaders @alcaldeledezma, @dsmolansky and @carlosvecchio. I stand with them in their struggle against the Maduro regime to restore democracy and protect human rights in #Venezuela. #SummitOfTheAmericas @SummitAmericas

Un honor reunirme hoy con los líderes de la oposición venezolana @alcaldeledezma, @dsmolansky y @carlosvecchio. Me uno a ellos en su lucha contra el régimen de Maduro para restaurar la democracia y proteger los derechos humanos en #Venezuela. @CumbreAmericas http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DavoNWUW0AEABF3.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DavoNWSW4AAsVwj.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DavoNWTWkAEwxQ9.jpg

RT @KenRoth What mission accomplished? Are Putin-Assad suddenly going to stop targeting civilians (main cause of civilian death)? Is Assad any more likely to stop using chemical weapons than he was after the US retaliatory attack a year ago (when he kept using them)? Is Assad in The Hague? https://twitter.com/realdonaldtrump/status/985130802668294144 QT @realDonaldTrump A perfectly executed strike last night. Thank you to France and the United Kingdom for their wisdom and the power of their fine Military. Could not have had a better result. Mission Accomplished!

RT @RichardEngel Assad wasn't targeted.  His air force remains intact.  US efforts taken to prevent escalation with Russia. So the message seems to be that the Syrian regime can continue its war and Assad still gets to win, just not by using chemical weapons. https://twitter.com/LizSly/status/985116039078957057 QT @LizSly Damascus is shrugging off the US strikes, which turned out to be more limited than feared. People are dancing in the streets, waving Assad’s portrait & saying Trump has failed. With @leloveluck https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/damascus-defiant-as-trump-orders-strikes-after-syria-chemical-attack/2018/04/14/5ec055a6-3f5c-11e8-955b-7d2e19b79966_story.html?utm_term=.efb938cdc0ab

RT @SlaughterAM The "mission" in Syria is definitely not accomplished; the U.S. HAS no clear mission. A genuine humanitarian mission would mean taking refugees & pushing others to do so, creating safe zones, punishing Assad for barrel bombs & indiscriminate attacks. #syriastrikes

Met with President @JuanOrlandoH and Foreign Minister Lara of #Honduras to thank them for their support of #Israel and U.S. at the @UN and his partnership targeting drug traffickers. #SummitOfTheAmericas @SummitAmericas

Me reuní con el presidente @JuanOrlandoH y la Ministra Lara de #Honduras para agradecerles por su apoyo a #Israel y Estados Unidos en la @ONU_es y su ayuda en combatir a los narcotraficantes. @CumbreAmericas #CumbrePeru http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DawUWXcVQAA5TBx.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DawUWXhUMAA4xWI.jpg

Met with US Ambassador to Peru Kris Urs and spoke about his important role serving US interests and regional opportunities. @SummitAmericas @USEMBASSYPERU

Me reuní con el Embajador de EEUU en el Perú Kris Urs, hablamos de su importante rol como vocero de los intereses de nuestro país y de las oportunidades regionales. @CumbreAmericas @USEMBASSYPERU http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DawfbelX0AA2NrZ.jpg
Spoke with our US Ambassador to Peru, Kris Urs, and spoke about his very important role serving US interests here and opportunities in the region. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DawdydJVMAU3tdo.jpg

Met with @ambctrujillo, I reassured him of our commitment to the region.

Met w/President @mauriciomacri & FM Faurie of #Argentina to thank them for their leadership on #Venezuela, to discuss importance of stronger trade & business relations between our countries. They will do a great job hosting G20 summit later this year. @SummitAmericas #SummitPeru

Me reuní con el presidente @mauriciomacri y el Ministro Faurie de #Argentina les agradecí su liderazgo sobre #Venezuela. Analizamos la importancia de un comercio más fuerte y nuestras relaciones comerciales. Harán un gran trabajo como anfitriones del G20. @CumbreAmericas http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Daw5pnfWkAEAsmI.jpg

Good meeting with President @mauriciomacri and FM Faurie of #Argentina. Thanked them for leadership on #Venezuela and discussed trade between our two nations. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Daw5CjQUMAAx4-A.jpg
The president needs to lay out a comprehensive strategy in Syria in consultation with Congress -- and he needs to do it now.

I strongly support our men and women in uniform and believe we must hold Assad accountable for his unconscionable use of chemical weapons. But I am deeply concerned about the legal rationale of last night’s strikes.
RT @Sabinwiki 'no divide between science and religion, science is the answer to our prayers.' -- Pelosi in Seattle. #MarchforScience http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DawrjgbU0AEi2my.jpg

Science should not and will not be ignored. It will not be silenced. Productive meeting with Vice Minister of Foreign Affairs Hugo de Zela Martinez and Ambassador Urs. We discussed US-Peru relations and gave our support to their leading role in the Lima Group. @SummitAmericas #SummitPeru

Productiva Reunión hoy con el Viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores Hugo de Zela Martínez y el Embajador Urs. Hablamos sobre las relaciones entre Estados Unidos y Perú, apoyamos su liderazgo en el Grupo de Lima. @CumbreAmericas #CumbrePeru http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Daw_qT8WkAcc2Xg.jpg

Haitian President @moisejovenel and I had a productive conversation about bilateral ties. We discussed TPS and new opportunities to strengthen economic development and security for the #Haitian people. #SummitOfTheAmericas

El presidente haitiano @moisejovenel y yo sostuvimos una conversación productiva sobre las relaciones bilaterales. Discutimos el Estatus de Protección Temporal (TPS) y nuevas oportunidades para fortalecer el desarrollo económico y la seguridad para los #Haitianos. @CumbreAmericas http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DaxXY6NXkAAUO-F.jpg

RT @dsmolansky Sostuvimos reunión con el senador @marcorubio. Nos reiteró el compromiso de desconocer el fraude del 20 mayo y los esfuerzos que está haciendo desde el Congreso para la ayuda humanitaria dentro y fuera de #Venezuela. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DawHEr6X4AEm0II.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DawHEr4XcAAYv__.jpg

Held a press conference with  @RepCurbelo and @RepPaulCook in Lima. We spoke to the press about our continued support for the restoration of democracy in #Venezuela and #Cuba. @SummitAmericas #SummitPeru

Sostuvimos una rueda de prensa con @RepCurbelo y @RepPaulCook en Lima. Hablamos con los periodistas sobre nuestro continuo apoyo a la restauración de la democracia en #Venezuela y #Cuba. @CumbreAmericas #CumbrePeru http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DaxPyXSWAAE2AMV.jpg

We have the masses out here—and we have to stay out in the streets. Then, let’s hit the ground running with VELOCITY to get to November with a massive blue wave at the polls.
